mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET worker_no = #{worker_no}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT en.* FROM employee em,employee_enterprise ee,enterprise en WHERE em.id = ee.employee_id AND en.id = ee.enterprise_id AND em.id = #{employeeId}
SELECT p.* FROM employee e,employee_product ep,product p WHERE e.id = ep.employee_id AND p.id = ep.product_id AND e.id = #{employeeId}
SELECT em2.* FROM employee em1,colleague_relation cr,employee em2 WHERE em1.id = #{employeeId} AND ((em1.id = cr.emp_id_1 AND em2.id = cr.emp_id_2) OR (em2.id = cr.emp_id_1 AND em1.id = cr.emp_id_2))
SELECT em2.* FROM employee em1,employee em2 WHERE em1.id = #{employeeId} AND em1.enterprise_id = em2.enterprise_id AND em1.id != em2.id
SELECT en.name enterprise_name,em.* FROM employee em,enterprise en WHERE em.enterprise_id = en.id AND em.id = #{employeeId}
